text.div:
MedicationRequestPatientNameSearchParameter

Parameter patient-name:string

Searches for MedicationRequest based on the patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?patient-name={name}

ResourceMedicationRequest
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesMedicationRequest
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: MedicationRequestPatientNameSearchParameter
description: Searches for MedicationRequest based on the patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?patient-name={name}
